actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the month of May of each year as National Small Business Month.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation: (1) designating the month of May of each year as "National Small Business Month"; and (2) inviting the Governors of the States, the chief officials of local governments, and the people of the United States to observe such week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the month of May of each year as National Small Business Month.
